title: GNOCCHI IN MUSTARD CREAM
directions: Prepare gnocchi in boiling salt water according to instructions. Afterwards pour off the gnocchis and let drain well.

Meanwhile peel and dice the onion. Fry bacon in a pan without fat until crispy. Remove from the pan. Braise the onion in the cooking fat lightly. Pour cooking cream on it, bring it to a boil and let thicken for about 4-5 minutes. Stir in the mustard and briefly bring to a boil.
Wash chives, shake it dry and cut into little rolls. Season so mustard cream with salt, pepper and a pinch of sugar. Mix in gnocchis and chives and heat briefly.
Serve the gnocchis on plates, crumble a part of the bacon over it and top with the remaining bacon stripes.
